http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif ADMIN-DISTANCE-LEARNING List ADMIN-DISTANCE-LEARNING List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=ADMIN-DISTANCE-LEARNING&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=ADMIN-DISTANCE-LEARNING.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-03-03T16:39:06Z Giovanni Vincenti 2015-03-03T16:16:30+00:00 2015-03-03T16:16:30+00:00 2nd International Conference on e-Learning e-Education and Online Training https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-DISTANCE-LEARNING;c6ba203f.1503 2nd International Conference on e-Learning e-Education and Online Training<br>16-18 September, 2015 - Novedrate (Como), Italy<br>http://eleot.org/<br><br>Scope<br>eLEOT 2015 will focus on e-learning initiatives related to STEM disciplines. We are looking for contributions that range from innovative ways to present information, to mobile-based interactive technologies simulating experiments, to methodologies to manage and study student performance from the back-end, and many more topics. We will also feature space for demonstrations and interactive sessions. More at http://eleot.org/. [...] Catherine Thomas-Varcoe 2015-02-23T14:04:53+00:00 2015-02-23T14:04:53+00:00 Free University of Manchester webinar - iBooks https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-DISTANCE-LEARNING;31073352.1502 Dear Colleague,<br><br>The Manchester Distance Learning Network (MaDLeN) are proud to be hosting another free webinar.<br><br>Damian Keil and Adam Palin from Manchester Metropolitan University will present a webinar about iBooks on 25 March at 1pm. Damian and Adam have been using iBooks to present their distance learning degree course in sports science over a period of time, with good results. They will present their course as a case study and discuss:<br>- the iBooks technology<br>- the benefits of iBooks for distance learning<br>- the challenges they have faced. [...] Spiller, Barbara 2015-02-22T22:48:43+00:00 2015-02-22T22:48:43+00:00 BOLDE update https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-DISTANCE-LEARNING;7e684126.1502 To all BOLDE research bank users<br><br>258 new records have just been added to the Blended, Online Learning and Distance Education research bank.<br><br>http://opac.acer.edu.au/drde/index.html<br><br>Under New additions, find April-December 2014 additions<br><br>Please note that only Australian material is currently being added to BOLDE.<br><br>Regards<br>Barbara Spiller James Moses 2015-02-18T15:10:17+00:00 2015-02-18T15:10:17+00:00 Take the survey of distance learning librarians https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-DISTANCE-LEARNING;3cf08435.1502 Primary Research Group Inc. (www.PrimaryResearch.com) publisher of research reports and surveys about libraries and higher education, is surveying academic librarians that specialize in or focus on as part of their work responsibilities the needs of distance learning students, including those in blended learning courses and MOOCS. Survey participants receive a free pdf copy of the report based on the survey results. The institutional names of participants are listed but responses are aggregated or unattributed. [...] Jackie Blanco 2015-01-30T05:17:46-07:00 2015-01-30T05:17:46-07:00 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Extended CFP: EECEA2015 Seminar and International Conference (Deadline: Feb. 3, 2015) https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-DISTANCE-LEARNING;9a094d5e.1501 Seminar and Second International Conference on Electrical, Electronics,<br>Computer Engineering and their Applications (EECEA2015)<br><br>World Trade Center, Manila, Philippines<br>February 11, 2015<br><br>University of Perpetual Help System Dalta, Las Pi\ufffd\ufffdas, Manila,<br>Philippines<br>February 12-14, 2015<br><br>http://bit.do/eecea2015 Charles Wankel 2015-01-10T17:06:10-05:00 2015-01-10T17:06:10-05:00 Integrating Curricula and Co-Curricula Endeavors to Enhance Intellectual, Intercultural, Global, Community, and Personal Student Outcomes https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-DISTANCE-LEARNING;97d9711e.1501 Integrating Curricula and Co-Curricula Endeavors to Enhance Intellectual,<br>Intercultural, Global, Community, and Personal Student Outcomes<br><br>Charles Wankel, St John's University, New York, and Laura A. Wankel,<br>Northeastern University, Boston<br><br>Call for Chapter proposals<br><br>In too many ways higher education is still a series of silo-like endeavors<br>rather than collaborative integrated fabrics. Integrating classroom learning<br>with out of class experience designed to produce significant outcomes<br>remains elusive and haphazard. Evidence that significant student learning<br>and development takes place in multiple venues such as internships, service<br>learning, clubs and organizations, student employment etc. invites<br>thoughtful integration of intellectual, personal, and behavioral linkages<br> [...] Lynn Cullimore 2015-01-08T10:19:28+00:00 2015-01-08T10:19:28+00:00 Free MOOCs in STEM seminar - University of Manchester, 23 January 2015 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-DISTANCE-LEARNING;20811522.1501 On Friday 23rd January 2015, the Faculty of Engineering and Physical Sciences at the University of Manchester hosts a one-day seminar on MOOCs in STEM. This will address the current positioning of MOOCs in Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics (STEM) teaching in higher education. It will include presentations by Simon Nelson, CEO of FutureLearn, Rick Levin, CEO of Coursera, and Dr Paul Yates, Academic Advisor for MOOCs at the Higher Education Academy, plus several talks from academics who have successfully delivered MOOCs in the STEM area. [...] Jackie Blanco 2015-01-07T01:41:48-07:00 2015-01-07T01:41:48-07:00 EECEA2015 Deadline Approaching | January 12, 2015 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-DISTANCE-LEARNING;f1c0cfae.1501 The Second International Conference on Electrical, Electronics, Computer<br>Engineering and their Applications (EECEA2015)<br><br>World Trade Center, Manila Philippines<br>Seminar Date: February 11, 2015<br><br>University of Perpetual Help System Dalta, Las Pi\ufffd\ufffdas - Manila,<br>Philippines<br>Conference Dates: February 12-14, 2015<br><br>http://sdiwc.net/conferences/eecea2015/<br><br>All registered papers will be included in SDIWC Digital Library. Stephanie Fuller 2014-11-19T12:57:22+00:00 2014-11-19T12:57:22+00:00 New Distance Learning Opportunities in Teaching and Learning at QMUL https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ADMIN-DISTANCE-LEARNING;3b86d1e3.1411 New Distance Learning Offering at QMUL<br><br>View this email in your browser<http://us7.campaign-archive2.com/?u=3dfa1780ce9b222493c94a5b7&id=152e2fe439&e=><br><br>[http://gallery.mailchimp.com/27aac8a65e64c994c4416d6b8/images/icon_envelope.png]<br><br>[https://gallery.mailchimp.com/3dfa1780ce9b222493c94a5b7/images/CAPD_full_blue_out13e041.jpg]<br><br>Online CPD Opportunities in Teaching and Learning<br><br>QMUL is pleased to announce that a new Distance Learning Programme from the Centre for Academic and Professional Development (CAPD) will be starting in January 2015<br><br>The Distance Learning Programme<http://capd.qmul.ac.uk/what-we-offer/educational-development/distance-learning-2/> is now taking applications for standalone modules as well as for the Certificate in Learning and Teaching (CILT) and Postgraduate Certificate in Academic Practice (PGCAP). Completion of CILT or PGCAP will enable participants to gain recognition as Associate and Fellow (respectively) of the Higher Education Academy.
